about_the_game:
{A total of 20 pixels H animation+7 high-definition pixels H animation+7 exquisite CG!}
Five chapters and a 4-boss to challenge !
[Girl's Way to Life 2: Blood Museum]
After experiencing the adventure of the Scary Mountain, the milk tea group who passed through the end of the day and turned into the pink hair giant breast girl finally followed Mina's footsteps to the "once" survivor base - the church.
But they found that the army had already abandoned this stronghold.
Just when they didn't know what the future was, a foreign pavilion in the dark suddenly gave off a strange and seductive light.
。
Is that the light of civilization? Or the bait that attracts prey in the deep sea
{2d horizontal board pixel action game!}
In the starry sky, you will play the role of a lonely pink mammoth girl, through the dark and deep sewer, and explore the abandoned and full of erotic magic woman's blood red museum.
Stripping the cocoon, while fighting with the Devil Mother, he untied the truth of the doom.
(Or degenerate into pleasure and become their flesh slaves~)
{Play method}
1. Cross the border and use guns and melee weapons to deal with the attacking enemy.
2. Become a magic girl and wave a huge sword to cut everything!
3. Collect points, purchase materials and props, and strengthen yourself!
4. Have a friendly exchange with the Devil Mother~enjoy the happiness of being a girl~
5. Or be rough treated by strong monsters
6. It still inherits the multi-outcome system of the previous work, and maintains the virginity until the final battle, but is defeated, may some "good things" happen?
{Encounter the girl whose tentacles are infinitely squeezing magic, waiting for her ending will be......}
{Fun}
H in battle+H after defeat, double training=double happiness!
The end of color is pixel meow!
Enjoy the happy time with the Devil Mother. You will not only be invaded by the monster, but also have sex with the Devil Mother~
The difficulty is very considerate. After customs clearance, you can enter the cg room and automatically unlock all contents!
(There are tentacles and lilies with various elements to satisfy most players who like astringency)
【Introduction to BOSS】
Bad women who like to use plants and nectar to astringent ↓↓↓↓

Be careful of her nectar and tentacles, they will make you lose your resistance (danger)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or it may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace. This game includes nude or sexual content, and involuntary sex.
All characters are over 20 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The sequel of the way for girls to survive has evolved from a static RPG to a dynamic 2d horizontal board pixel action game! You will continue to play (big chest and no brain) the pink hair giant breast girl - milk tea, and adventure in a bloody museum full of mysteries!
